A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Predictable\, shallow dialogue revolving around the same tired as conversations about \"hope\"\, \"resistance\" and being a \"rebel\". The evil people are here\, the good people are here\, and yup\, you guessed it\, the rebels don't get defeated. The final scene with Luke fooling the bad Kilo dude was cool\, but overall this was a shit movie that was clearly made to politically pander. Making it\, what's the word? Oh yeah\, propaganda.
